summary: Traumatised rape victim Jessie (Anne Parillaud) is living a double life as a cool assassin on a mission and as a paranoid bride on her honeymoon.
cast: William Baldwin|Anne Parillaud|Lisanne Falk|Graham Greene|Bulle Ogier|Billy Wilmott|O'Neil Peart|Leonie Forbes|Rick Ravanello|Marc Akerstream|Peter Hanlon|Alwyn Scott|Pablo Hoilett|Fay Ellington|Ilona Margolis|Roger Allford|Ben Odberg|Johanna Ulett|Paul Magel|Pablo Coffey|Nahtasha Budhi|Keli Westgate|Lloyd A. Silverman
keywords: dream within a dream within a dream|honeymoon|assassin|contract murderer|murderess
title: En brazos de mi asesino
